member.name: PSS_DUPLICATE_FLAGS
member.summary: Duplication flags for use by PssDuplicateSnapshot.

member.name: PSS_DUPLICATE_FLAGS.PSS_DUPLICATE_CLOSE_SOURCE
member.summary: Free the source handle. This will only succeed if you set the PSS_CREATE_USE_VM_ALLOCATIONS flag when you called PssCaptureSnapshot to create the snapshot and handle. The handle will be freed even if duplication fails. The close operation does not protect against concurrent access to the same descriptor.
